title: The Power of Now
author: Eckhart Tolle
summary: Tolle's guide to spiritual enlightenment and living in the present moment. 'The Power of Now' explores the concept of mindfulness, offering practical insights to help readers achieve a state of heightened awareness and inner peace.

title: The Four Agreements
author: Don Miguel Ruiz
summary: Ruiz's exploration of ancient Toltec wisdom and the four agreements that can lead to personal freedom and fulfillment. 'The Four Agreements' provides a code of conduct for living a life of authenticity and happiness.

title: Autobiography of a Yogi
author: Paramahansa Yogananda
summary: Yogananda's spiritual memoir recounting his journey to self-realization and encounters with spiritual leaders. 'Autobiography of a Yogi' explores the teachings of yoga and meditation, offering insights into the quest for spiritual truth.
